identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Mix 'GovTech Authority' with 'Fintech Precision'.

theme_strategy.logic: Light Mode for Tourist Portal (Trust, Clarity, Day-use). Dark Mode for Police Admin (Night-ops, High Contrast, Command Center).

danger.name: Signal Red
danger.usage: Panic Button, Critical Alerts, High Risk Zones

structure: Action: Panic Button (Floating or Fixed Bottom)
tourist_portal.spacing: Generous (p-6 to p-8) for touch targets

custom_components.name: SafetyScoreRing
custom_components.description: Animated SVG circle showing 0-100 score. Green > 80, Yellow > 50, Red < 50.

custom_components.name: PanicButton
custom_components.description: Large, tactile button. Long-press to activate (prevents accidental clicks). Haptic feedback visual.

custom_components.name: LiveMap
custom_components.description: Wrapper around map library (Leaflet/Mapbox). Custom markers for Tourists (Blue) and Alerts (Red).

custom_components.name: DigitalIDCard
custom_components.description: Flip card animation. Front: Photo + Details. Back: QR Code.

styling_rules.shadows: shadow-lg (Tourist Cards) vs shadow-none border-r (Admin Panels)
styling_rules.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md for overlays and sticky headers.

images.description: Couple walking on dock, safe and happy vibe.
Officer with drone controller, high-tech monitoring context.
Aerial city view for map backgrounds.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic 'AI' emojis (ðŸ¤–, ðŸš€) in UI text.
Transitions: `transition-all duration-300 ease-out` for hover states.
Accessibility: Ensure Red/Green status colors have text labels for colorblind users.
Forms: Use `react-hook-form` with `zod` validation (via Shadcn Form).
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: `lucide-react`, `recharts`, `framer-motion`, `clsx`, `tailwind-merge`. 2. Setup Tailwind theme colors first. 3. Build the 'SafetyScoreRing' and 'PanicButton' components early as they are core to the Tourist experience. 4. For the Map, use a placeholder component if a real map key is not available, but style it to look real.
